virtual const iimg::IBitmap* iipr::IBitmapProvider::GetBitmap ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get access to produced bitmap object.

Returns:
pointer to bitmap instance if this bitmap is accessible, or NULL.

Implemented in iipr::CDelegatedBitmapSupplierComp, icam::CSelectableBitmapSupplierComp, icam::CSnapBitmapSupplierComp, iipr::CBitmapJoinerSupplierComp, iipr::CDifferenceBitmapSupplierComp, iipr::CProcessedBitmapSupplierComp, and iipr::CBitmapProviderCacheComp.
